# token

**Instance Property**

A unique push token that may be used to deliver updates for this control.

## Declaration

```swift
let token: Data
```

## Discussion

This token is valid until told otherwise through the [doc://com.apple.WidgetKit/documentation/WidgetKit/ControlPushHandler/pushTokensDidChange(controls:)] method on your push handler.
title: token
